modName: ESO Altmer Armor by NewerMind43 RELOAD
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=red][size=3][size=4]NEW.BETTER.AWESOME
Before installation, I recommend to remove the old version
==================================[/size]
NEXUS EXCLUSIVE.DO NOT reupload this file.I do not give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size][/color][/center]


One more armor mod that based on cinematic movie for Elder Scrolls Online.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Base Body:UNP

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84229?]Spanish Translation
[/url]

Also tested with CBBE and all work fine
------------------------------------------------
[center]VERSION 1.1
Now you can upgrade armor
Now armor have correct material - Elven
Add new details to the armor
Some mesh fix

VERSION 1.2
Some mesh fix(look screenshot)
by many,many and many request i'm add underwear

VERSION 1.3
New,more detailed model
Full reworked textures
New sword model[/center]

Location:

The Lady Stone
--------------------------------------------------

Big Thanks to:

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2589176-aurianavaloria1/]AurianaValoria1[/url]
